title: The width of the street (if any) in front and of the street (if any) at the side or near the buildin
clause_text: The width of the street (if any) in front and of the street (if any) at the side or near the building; The direction of the north line relative to the plan of the building; Any existing physical features, such as wells, tanks, drains or trees;

source_pdf.text_snippet: The width of the street (if any) in front and of the street (if any) at the side or near the building;
